KnowledgeItem.Title: AIDEWorkflowHandlePKG
KnowledgeItem.Description: Initiates the workflow for handling packages related to the installation of AIDE by writing into the MARS model and creating new corresponding DataBlocks in the Issue.

IssueCondition.Description: Searches for an Issue with DataBlock AIDEWorkflowHandlePKG and the necessary information for successful completion of workflow.

Activate.XMLExtract:
<NewBlock><Tasks 
			    PKG=debconf-utils
				TargetMachine=${AWHP:TargetMachine}            
				TargetState=Created
				Host=${AWHP:Host}
				User=${AWHP:User}
				Lib=PKG
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
				CurrentState=ReadState/> 
				</NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks 
				TargetMachine=${AWHP:TargetMachine}            
				TargetState=Created
				Host=${AWHP:Host}
				User=${AWHP:User}
				Command='sudo debconf-set-selections <<< 'postfix	postfix/mailname	string	${AWHP:EmailID}''
				Lib=RUNCOMMAND
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
				CurrentState=ReadState/> 
				</NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks 
				TargetMachine=${AWHP:TargetMachine}            
				TargetState=Created
				Host=${AWHP:Host}
				User=${AWHP:User}
				Command='sudo debconf-set-selections <<< 'postfix	postfix/main_mailer_type	string	 Internet Site''
				Lib=RUNCOMMAND
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
				CurrentState=ReadState/> 
				</NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks 
			    PKG=aide
				TargetMachine=${AWHP:TargetMachine}            
				TargetState=Created
				Host=${AWHP:Host}
				User=${AWHP:User}
				Lib=PKG
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
				CurrentState=ReadState/> 
				</NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks 
				TargetMachine=${AWHP:TargetMachine}            
				TargetState=Created
				Host=${AWHP:Host}
				User=${AWHP:User}
				Command='sudo sed -i 's/MAILTO=root/MAILTO=${AWHP:EmailID}/' /etc/default/aide'
				Lib=RUNCOMMAND
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
				CurrentState=ReadState/> 
				</NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks 
				TargetMachine=${AWHP:TargetMachine}            
				TargetState=Created
				Host=${AWHP:Host}
				User=${AWHP:User}
				Command='sudo update-aide.conf'
				Lib=RUNCOMMAND
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
				CurrentState=ReadState/> 
				</NewBlock>
